page.title: 17The Jinney Ring Craft Centre
page.content: The{craftsmen}and women at the Jinney Ring are engaged in wood turning, pottery, embroidery, leather work and stained glass, all{arts and crafts. They make items for sale to visitors and will undertake special commissions which are appropriate. It is possible for{tourists}to watch the craftsmen as they work as well as talk to them.The materials that they use are not necessarily local ones, they can be imported if needed. The{crafts undertaken can change from time to time, or the number could be increased.
